subject: Run tests and verify
description:
Run the unit tests to verify the implementation:
```bash
docker compose exec makeimg pytest tests/test_prompt_enhancer.py -v
```

If tests fail, fix the issues and re-run until all pass.

Then verify the API endpoint with curl:
```bash
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5560/api/generation/enhance-prompt \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "x-api-token: makeimg_dev_token" \
  -d '{"prompt": "a beautiful cat sitting on a windowsill"}' | python3 -m json.tool
```

curl -s -X POST http://localhost:5560/api/generation/enhance-prompt \
